pages.text: They consult ona about spoils vojnovy. Say The! spoils z vojnovy belong do GOD posol. Ona observe GOD exhort jeden iny bol righteous obey GOD Jeho posol ona bol believers
true believers bol those srdce zachviet sa when GOD zmierit sa when Jeho revelations recited them ich faith zosilnit they trust ich Lord
They observe Zmluva Prayers (Salat) z our provisions do them they dat laska k bliznemu
Such som true believers. They attain high ranks ich Lord i mat rad forgiveness generous provision
Potom tvoj Lord willed ze ona lavy tvoj domov fulfill specific plan some believers became exposed mat rad reluctant believers
They argued ona truth vecer everything explained them. They cin mat rad they driven certain smrt
Recall lenze GOD promised ona victory certain zoskupit ona still chudoba face chaby zoskupit! bol GOD's plan zriadit truth Jeho words defeat disbelievers
He decreed ze truth prevail falsehood zmiznut evildoers
